name: Raheem BROWN, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, ex rel., Respondents
name_abbreviation: Brown v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Raheem BROWN, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, ex rel., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of April, 2016, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and the Application for an Immediate Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
134 A.3d 446
Raheem BROWN, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, ex rel., Respondents.
No. 23 EM 2016.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 6, 2016.
